name: Gary's Adventure
description:
Gary lived peaceful life as a math teacher on a planet called Squaria. Until one day, the Cuadidos that lived on Squaria's sister planet, Cuadradia, attacked Squaria and captured its people. Now play as Gary in this retro-style 2D platformer  and save Squaria from destruction! Follow RGP on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedGameProduc

Credits

Art - Reddog
Animation - Reddog
Computer Programming - Reddog
